body.p: Therefore the IFRIC decided to modify the proposal in D25 and identify a preferred measurement basis. In identifying this preferred measurement basis, the IFRIC noted that many respondents considered that the principles in IFRS 2 and the Framework referred to in paragraph BC16 support a measurement based on the fair value of the liability extinguished.
